Articles.Content:
Hi, ive been having a bug with procedural wings. It's where I cannot delete a wing even if i delete a part connected to it, it's kinda like a gjost part. its really annoying because i have to remake my plane completely because i cant delete the part. It mainly happens with the rudder but ive had it happen with the elavators a few times.

Someone please help me with this.

See ya

Disco,

Please see the stickied How to Get Support thread. It describes most of the information needed to help you and where you can find it.
Stickied threads are pinned to the top of the forum so they're always visible. This one is at the top of the Support (modded installs) forum.
